title: Number One!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Dia-senpai, look here! This is Kasumin’s new outfit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>My, it really suits you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Is it cute? It’s cute, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, of course, it’s very cute<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehehehe~. Am I cuter than Ruby-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh….Won’t that be a hard comparison to make….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh…. It’s true that Ruby-chan is cute, but even Kasumin is….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I didn’t mean it like that. Ruby’s cuteness and your cuteness are two different forms of cuteness, Kasumi-san. In your own cuteness, you’re definitely the number one, Kasumi-san, no one can beat you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Number One! Of course! Kasumin thought so too~, Kasumin was just a little bit surprised to hear it~. Ehehehe!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu. You really are cute, Kasumi-san. You just make me want to pet you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
